resources.string: Choose a higher number.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points

Congratulations, level passed!

	And did you know that number 7 is the luckiest number. There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of Creation and much more.
	Also the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people all over the world.
Choose a Roman numeral that is larger.\nThe questions may be repeated until you reach 20 points
\tCongratulations, level passed!\n\n\tAnd did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?
